title: Breakingviews TV: Baggage claim
text:
Breakingviews TV: Baggage claim 8:52pm IST - 04:28
An experienced short seller has targeted $6 billion luggage maker Samsonite. Quentin Webb and Jeffrey Goldfarb discuss what it means for the company, as well the possible repercussions for the Hong Kong exchange where it is listed. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
An experienced short seller has targeted $6 billion luggage maker Samsonite. Quentin Webb and Jeffrey Goldfarb discuss what it means for the company, as well the possible repercussions for the Hong Kong exchange where it is listed.
